FUNCTION quickfidmask, input_image, thresh ;+ ; :Description: ; Finds center of mask where pixels are above a given threshold ; ; :Params: ; input_image : in, required, type=byte ; 2D array of pixels to mask with threshold ; thresh : in, required, type=float ; Threshold used to select pixels ;- input_image = FLOAT(input_image) a = input_image[SORT(input_image)] niceimage = a[0:(1-!param.elim_perc/100)*(N_ELEMENTS(a)-1)] ; Eliminating the highest 1% of data IF thresh eq !null then thresh = !param.reg1thresh*MAX(niceimage) ; IF n_elements(thresh) EQ 0 THEN thresh = 0.25*MAX(image) s = SIZE(input_image,/dimensions) n_col = s[0] n_row = s[1] suncheck = input_image lt thresh xpos = TOTAL( TOTAL(suncheck, 2) * INDGEN(n_col) ) / TOTAL(suncheck) ypos = TOTAL( TOTAL(suncheck, 1) * INDGEN(n_row) ) / TOTAL(suncheck) RETURN, {xpos:xpos,ypos:ypos} END
